title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. II, pt. 194 - Forest Practices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. II, pt. 194 - Forest Practices

State Regulations
§ 194.1 - Definitions
§ 194.2 - Prescribed fires on state land under the jurisdiction of the department
§ 194.3 - Prescribed fire management plan for state land under the jurisdiction of the department
§ 194.4 - Prescribed burns on nondepartment lands
§ 194.5 - Prescribed burn plan for nondepartment lands
§ 194.6 - Review of prescribed burn management plans for nondepartment lands
§ 194.7 - Approval of prescribed burn management plans for nondepartment lands
§ 194.8 - Protection of adjoining property
§ 194.9 - Permits
§ 194.10 - Reporting
§ 194.11 - Enforcement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. II, pt. 194

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §1-0101, 3-0301, 9-0105 and 9-1105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
